TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TextCompositionEventHandler(object sender, TextCompositionEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed TextCompositionEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TextCompositionEventHandler(sender As Object, e As TextCompositionEventArgs)
public delegate void TextCompositionEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, TextCompositionEventArgs ^ e);
type TextCompositionEventHandler = delegate of obj * TextCompositionEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理与 和 类相关的路由事件的方法（例如 ）。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the routed events related to the and classes, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托与以下附加事件一起使用:This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - - - - - 此委托还与基元素上的以下路由事件一起使用。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 这些路由事件转发了前面列出的一些附加事件, 使其更易于访问中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的常规元素模型。These routed events forward some of the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - 附加事件和基本元素路由事件共享其事件数据, 路由事件的冒泡和隧道版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 这可能会影响事件在传输事件路由时的已处理特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
